mapper.select: select em.firstName, em.lastName, sum(amount) as total from employees em join customers cus on em.id=cus.salesRepEmployee join payments pay on pay.customerId=cus.id group by em.lastName limit 5;
mapper.insert: insert into employees (firstName, lastName, email, phone, officeCode, reportsTo, jobTitle) values (#{firstName},#{lastName},#{email},#{phone},#{officeCode},#{reportsTo},#{jobTitle})
